title: CALIFORNIA SURF LODGE
description: Endless summer vibes where the Beach Boys meet Big Wednesday. Sun-bleached hair, VW buses, and that perfect wave that's always just around the next point. Hang ten, dude.

beach_boys.title: BEACH BOYS BREAKFAST
beach_boys.description: Good Vibrations - Harmony-rich surf pop with California dreaming

good_vibrations.title: Good Vibrations Special
good_vibrations.description: Pure California harmony with that Pet Sounds sophistication. Every song sounds like driving PCH with the top down and the ocean on your right.
good_vibrations.samples: "Good Vibrations" by The Beach Boys, "California Gurls" by The Beach Boys, "Surfin' USA" by The Beach Boys

pet_sounds_perfection.title: Pet Sounds Perfection
pet_sounds_perfection.description: Brian Wilson's studio genius with symphonic surf arrangements. When pop music becomes high art and California becomes a state of mind. These tracks prove that the simplest songs can contain infinite complexity.
pet_sounds_perfection.samples: "God Only Knows" by The Beach Boys, "Wouldn't It Be Nice" by The Beach Boys, "Caroline, No" by The Beach Boys, "Don't Worry Baby" by The Beach Boys

wilson_brothers.title: Wilson Brothers Harmony
wilson_brothers.description: Sibling rivalry channeled into celestial harmonies. When family dysfunction creates the most beautiful sounds on earth. These songs understand that sometimes the best art comes from the most complicated relationships.
wilson_brothers.samples: "I Get Around" by The Beach Boys, "Help Me, Rhonda" by The Beach Boys, "California Girls" by The Beach Boys, "Kokomo" by The Beach Boys

surf_rock.title: SURF ROCK CLASSICS
surf_rock.description: Reverb-Drenched Instrumentals - Dick Dale meets pipeline perfection

pipeline.title: Pipeline Special
pipeline.description: Pure surf guitar with that wet reverb sound. Dick Dale's guitar meets the curl of the perfect wave. These tracks understand that some of the best music has no words, just the sound of six strings and the ocean calling.
pipeline.samples: "Pipeline" by The Chantays, "Misirlou" by Dick Dale, "Walk Don't Run" by The Ventures, "Wipe Out" by The Surfaris

big_wednesday.title: Big Wednesday
big_wednesday.description: Epic surf sessions with cinematic scope. When riding waves becomes a spiritual experience and every set tells the story of California itself. Music for those who understand that surfing is more than sport—it's religion.
big_wednesday.samples: "Penetration" by The Pyramids, "Surf Beat" by Dick Dale, "Bulldog" by The Fireballs, "Thunder Wave" by The Lively Ones

endless_summer.title: Endless Summer Sessions
endless_summer.description: Documentary perfection with wanderlust energy. Bruce Brown's camera following perfect waves around the world. These tracks capture that beautiful obsession with finding the perfect wave, the perfect moment, the perfect summer that never ends.
endless_summer.samples: "Theme from A Summer Place" by Percy Faith, "California Sun" by The Rivieras, "Surfer Joe" by The Surfaris, "Mr. Moto" by The Belairs

van_life.title: VW BUS ROAD TRIPS
van_life.description: Hippie Highway Adventures - Folk rock meets freedom on four wheels

magic_bus.title: Magic Bus Chronicles
magic_bus.description: Volkswagen wanderlust with folk rock freedom. Every mile is a memory and every breakdown is an adventure. These tracks understand that the best journeys happen when you're not in a hurry to get anywhere.
magic_bus.samples: "Magic Bus" by The Who, "Going Up the Country" by Canned Heat, "Creeque Alley" by The Mamas & The Papas, "California Dreamin'" by The Mamas & The Papas

highway_one.title: Highway One Odyssey
highway_one.description: Pacific Coast cruising with windows down and worries behind. Big Sur meets Monterey in a symphony of switchbacks and sea spray. Music for when the journey becomes more important than any destination.
highway_one.samples: "Ventura Highway" by America, "Hotel California" by Eagles, "California Love" by 2Pac, "Under the Bridge" by Red Hot Chili Peppers

sunset_strip.title: Sunset Strip Sessions
sunset_strip.description: LA folk rock with Laurel Canyon soul. When the counterculture had record deals and the revolution was televised. These tracks capture that moment when hippie ideals met Hollywood dreams and somehow both survived.
sunset_strip.samples: "For What It's Worth" by Buffalo Springfield, "Mr. Tambourine Man" by The Byrds, "Suite: Judy Blue Eyes" by Crosby, Stills & Nash, "Fire and Rain" by James Taylor

malibu_vibes.title: MALIBU SUNSET LOUNGE
malibu_vibes.description: Sophisticated Beach House - Where surf culture meets wine culture

beach_house.title: Beach House Sophistication
beach_house.description: Upscale coastal vibes with that Malibu money energy. When your beach house has a wine cellar and your surfboard costs more than most cars. Music for sunset cocktails on private beaches.
beach_house.samples: "Surfin' Bird" by The Trashmen, "Kokomo" by The Beach Boys, "Escape (The Piña Colada Song)" by Rupert Holmes, "Margaritaville" by Jimmy Buffett

point_break.title: Point Break Philosophy
point_break.description: Zen and the art of wave riding. Patrick Swayze meets Buddha on a longboard. These tracks understand that surfing is meditation in motion, a way of touching something eternal through temporary perfection.
point_break.samples: "Deep" by Pearl Jam, "Alive" by Pearl Jam, "Under Pressure" by Queen & David Bowie, "Riders on the Storm" by The Doors

california_dreaming.title: California Dreaming Deluxe
california_dreaming.description: Golden State of mind with premium production values. When the California dream comes with a trust fund and connections in the industry. Music for those who moved to LA and actually made it.
california_dreaming.samples: "California Love" by 2Pac ft. Dr. Dre, "Going Back to Cali" by LL Cool J, "I Love L.A." by Randy Newman, "Beverly Hills" by Weezer
